title: woord suggesties
content: Bij het typen van bijv password binnen een web pagina komt een automatische kleine pop up met woord suggesties. Ik heb geprobeerd dit uit te zetten maar kan het niet vinden in settings. Kunt u helpen bvd
creator: doomplanet

title: Firefox won't open log in pages
content:
I just bought a new laptop and downloaded Firefox as I have used it for years. Although I imported my passwords and they are correct it will not log in to sites I need for work. It isn't telling me I have the wrong pw or id, it just does nothing.

I have updated windows, I have uninstalled and reinstalled....I don't know what else to do...any suggestions?

thanks
creator: Lynnkeogh

title: Can't close Firefox with multi pages opened through right clicking the taskbar.
content:
Firefox Version: 124.0.2 (64 bit) Windows Version: Windows 10 LTSC 2019 (Version 1809)

When I right click the taskbar and press close Firefox, here comes the interface just as the screenshot uploaded. The blue close button doesn't response no matter how I click it and the Firefox's taskbar is flashing yellow. This bug only occurs on the first window of Firefox and only when user right click the taskbar.

It has been a long time for me wishing that some updates would be released soon to fix this issue, while noting happens. Or this bug is only for me?

title: Firefox session memory was lost in the old version
content:
Currently, I use Firefox version: 116.0.2 on Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS.

I encountered a phenomenon like this:

  • When I logged in to the application, in the tab I was working on, the Firefox session memory was lost (don't open new tabs)

What is the cause of this phenomenon? How can I fix it?
creator: hien.le4221995

title: How to delete this Add-on !?
content: I don't know why this "Add-on" (?) appear on my Firefox search bar. How to delete it ?
creator: cldjr

title: Delete History fails to do a complete job
content:
I've been noticing that when I click History > Clear Recent history, after clicking and going back to History, it hasn't removed everything. I have Firefox on my Android phone which is set to clear history upon close. For for unknown reasons, its leaving sites from both desktop and phone apps after clearing.

I'm running Firefox v 115.9.1esr on my Mac.

Any ideas?
creator: jontalk
